Audio is NOT AC3, but 2 channel 114kbps MP3.

Also, idk what "720x" is supposed to be, but this is basically in PAL format. 720p (if that is what the upper is getting at) would have a height of 720, not a width, which is what this has.

Otherwise, decent rip, though it wouldn't surprise me if this wasn't DVD, and actually from SDTV or something.
